verbs.description: President Donald Trump 's trade war with China [V: does] n't appear to be coming to a close anytime soon . The president , Secretary of State Mike Pompeo , and Peter Navarro are all talking a tough game on China . The tough talk has economists worried about what the tariffs could mean for the US economy .

The tough talk has economists worried about what the tariffs could mean for the US economy .
